content: > this pattern is free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there are also bonus garment schematics included in the ad-free pdf the men s shawl collar crochet cardigan is a traditional knit-look crochet garment an heirloom piece of clothing that you can enjoy your whole life it s not only the coziest piece of crochet wear you will ever have in your wardrobe it s also the most versatile it s the perfect everyday sweater the shawl collar cardigan has both a formal and relaxed vibe that ranges from business wear to something you ll wear lounging around at home wear it in place of a sport coat if you don t want a tailored look button it up and wear it to most workplaces as smart or business casual it can also be worn as an overcoat alternative or it can be worn under an overcoat as a layering garment *the crochet cardigan pattern includes instructions for side seam pockets and no pockets **sizing** - the pattern is written in men s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large to fit chest 32-33 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 54-56 **yarn notes** - the sample shown in the photos is lion brand basic stitch antimicrobial / 4 / worsted weight yarn 100 g / 3 5oz / 186 yards / 170 m / 65% recycled polyester / 35% amicor acrylic other lighter worsted weight 4 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met - yardage 2 100 2 200 1 650 2 340 2 480 2 700 2 900 3 100 **pattern notes** - this written crochet cardigan pattern is 44 pages long and includes several garment schematics measurements for each step to help keep your gauge on track extensive progression photos and photo tutorials along with tips and tricks where needed it also includes instructions for adjusting the length of the cardigan and two pocket options purchase the kit here aff 2 lion brand also has a full kit of the men s shawl collar cardigan available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern men s shawl collar cardigan design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2023 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity
